ingredients.content: 350 g kale, cut in bite-sized pieces, tough stems removed

preparations.content: Place coconut oil, onions and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>6 min/120°C/speed <b>.
Add kale, pushing it down into the bowl, and cook <b>3 min/100°C//speed 2<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add coconut milk, salt, pepper and nutmeg then cook <b>8 min/100°C//speed 0.5<b>. Adjust seasoning if necessary and serve.
